original_text: Some other people hear my message but they do not obey it. Those people are like another man who built a house. This man did not dig down deep to the rock. Instead, he put the first line of stones on the top of the ground. Then he built his house on them. A storm came and it brought a lot of water. It hit that house and it fell down immediately. The water completely destroyed it.’
korean_text: 듣고 행하지 아니하는 자는 주추 없이 흙 위에 집 지은 사람과 같으니 탁류가 부딪치매 집이 곧 무너져 파괴됨이 심하니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Some other people hear my message
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 다른 사람들은 내 메시지를 듣지만

sentences.original_text: but they do not obey it
Those people are like another man
This man did not dig down deep
Instead, he put the first line of stones
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 그는 첫 번째 돌 줄을 놓았습니다

sentences.original_text: on the top of the ground
Then he built his house on them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 위에 그의 집을 지었습니다

sentences.original_text: and it brought a lot of water
